column4: are there any guides for installing an atheros wireless card in ubuntu using madwifi?
my atheros card worked on its own
did you just plug it in and it started working?  or did you have it connected during the ubuntu installation?
I plugged and it started working
I had to configure the network though. but the card itself worked imediately
are you sure it has an atheros chipset?
yes.. its a superg adapter.  in fact, during the ubuntu installation it was detected.  but once i finished the os installation, all that shows up is my wired adapter
what happens if you try   sudo modprobe pci_ath
I don't know if it should be the same module or not
the network card? no not in xorg.conf
do you have the linux-restricted-modules package for your kernel installed?  pci_ath should be found at least
uname -a to get the kernel version
sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-386  to make sure its installed
maybe its not working in dapper right now I don't know
